title: cgo fails with apple gcc based on llvm 2377
body:
A gcc from the Xcode 4.2 beta is, for programs like

typeof(C.free)* ptr1;

omitting the full function description from the DWARF
debug output.  It shows up as a pointer node with no
child type, so cgo thinks it is a void*.

I hope Apple fixes LLVM before the official Xcode 4.2,
but if not, we'll have to find yet another way to do this.

Reported by Matthias Wessendorf.

i686-apple-darwin10-llvm-gcc-4.2 (GCC) 4.2.1 (Based on Apple Inc.
build 5658) (LLVM build 2377.00)
